name: EnableStuntBonusForPlayer
description: Toggle stunt bonuses for a player. Enabled by default.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to toggle stunt bonuses for.

params_body.name: enable
params_body.description: 1 to enable stunt bonuses and 0 to disable them.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player is not connected.
related_fn: EnableStuntBonusForAll: Toggle stunt bonuses for all players.
